summary.para: Retrieves the numeric value (Code Page identifier) of the ANSI code page.

param.name: puiCodePage
param.para: The numeric value (Code Page identifier) of the ANSI code page.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the numeric value of the ANSI code page to a specified code page identifier.

param.name: uiCodePage
param.para: The numeric value of the ANSI code page you want to set.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets and sets the numeric value (Code Page identifier) of the ANSI code page.
